longBusinessSummary: Aarvi Encon Limited operates as a technical manpower outsourcing company for engineering sector in India and the United Arab Emirates. The company offers procurement assistance and expending; pre commissioning and commissioning services; manpower outsourcing, and deputation and technical staffing; operation and maintenance; project and engineering design; project management; CAD/drafting/3D modelling; shutdown; construction supervision; and inspection services. It serves cement, engineering, infrastructure, metro, petrochemical, railway, telecom, EPC, IT, mono rail, pipeline, refinery, CGD and CNG, fertilizer, metal and minerals, oil and gas, power, and renewable energy industries. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
